short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to alphabetize text line by line.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alphabetizer is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you sort, organize, and modify text efficiently. With a wide range of features, you can not only alphabetize text line by line but also apply various transformations and customizations to your text.

With the 1.1, Alphabetizer now has many features but they're all hidden under the "Settings" button in order to keep the interface clean.

Features:
•Alphabetize text in seconds: Simply paste your text into the input box, click the "Alphabetize" button, and watch as your text is instantly sorted line by line. You can also choose to disable alphabetizing and only apply the other modifications.
•Real-time statistics: Keep track of the number of characters, words, and lines in your text as you edit it with our dynamic information display.
•Advanced sorting options: Choose your preferred sort order (ascending or descending), case sensitivity, and whether to sort by number or alphabetically.
•Text transformations: Transform your text to uppercase, lowercase, or trim spaces from each line.
•Custom text addition: Add custom text to the beginning or end of each line.
•List numbering: Add numbering to your list items for better organization.
•Remove empty lines: Keep your text clean and concise by removing any empty lines.
•Customizable delimiter: Choose your own delimiter for splitting and joining lines.
•Support for Turkish characters: Alphabetizer seamlessly handles Turkish characters.
•Modern and intuitive interface: The clean and easy-to-use interface allows you to focus on your task without any distractions.

With Alphabetizer, managing and organizing your text has never been easier. Try it today and experience the difference!
